title: Derek Powell & Blake Rong
description:
Derek Powell is an automotive journalist and content creator for Motor Trend. Blake Rong used to write for our websit, then went on to work for Autoweek, Jalopnik, and Road & Track, and now he has a book called "Beautiful Machines." 

Read Derek's stuff!

https://www.motortrend.com/staff/derek-powell/

Buy Blake's book!

https://www.amazon.com/Beautiful-Machines-Gestalten/dp/3899559886

 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/xmZv7SUDqT0

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @dereklanepowell @bzrong

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
